Description: Newly Renovated 2 Bedroom Apartment at the corner of Pinckney and Brimmer Street. This Floor through Unit Features Recessed Lighting, New Kitchen and Stainless-Steel Appliances, Marble Tiled Bathroom, Hardwood Floors Throughout with Tall Ceilings, Decorative Mouldings and Decorative Marble Fireplace and In Unit Laundry. Bay Windows with plenty of Natural Sunlight and Overlook Brimmer Street at the Front of the unit. Very Close to Charles Street, MGH, The Public Gardens and Boston Common. Heat and Hot Water Included.
